targets.expr: sum by(redpanda_group) (max by(redpanda_namespace, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) (redpanda_kafka_max_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_namespace="kafka", redpanda_topic=~"[[redpanda_topic]]"}) - on(redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) group_right max by(redpanda_group, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition)(redpanda_kafka_consumer_group_committed_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_group=~"[[redpanda_group]]"})+1)

panels.description: The total amount of full restarts of the job in the selected time period
panels.title: Full Restarts

targets.expr: sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}) by (job, job_version) or on(job) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_pub_sub_project_PubSubPullMessagesCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by (job, job_version) or on(job) sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}) by (job, job_version)  or on(job) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_spanner_change_stream_reader_DataRecordCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"})) by (job, job_version)

sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"} offset 7d) by (job, job_version) or on(job) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_pub_sub_project_PubSubPullMessagesCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m] offset 7d)) by (job, job_version) or on(job) sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"} offset 7d) by (job, job_version)  or on(job) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_spanner_change_stream_reader_DataRecordCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"} offset 7d)) by (job, job_version)

(sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}) by(job) or on(job) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_pub_sub_project_PubSubPullMessagesCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) or on(job) sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"})  by (job) or on() vector(0)) / on(job) (sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"} offset 1d) by(job) or on(job) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_pub_sub_project_PubSubPullMessagesCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m] offset 1d)) by (job) or on(job) sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"} offset 1d) by (job) or on() vector(1))

sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_processEvent_target_action_direction_result_total{processEvent=~"$event_type", target="none", job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (processEvent, action, direction, result)

sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_processEvent_target_action_direction_result_output_total{processEvent=~"$event_type", target="none", job=~"$taskmanager_job", direction="output"}[1m])) by (processEvent, action, result, output)

sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_processEvent_target_action_direction_result_output_total{target="$target", job=~"$taskmanager_job", direction="output"}[1m])) by (processEvent, action, result, output)

targets.expr: sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.999"}) by (operator_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by (operator_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (operator_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by (operator_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (operator_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by (operator_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (operator_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by (operator_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.95"}) by (operator_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by (operator_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (operator_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by (operator_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.75"}) by (operator_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by (operator_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (operator_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_batchJoin_RightInterval_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by (operator_name)

sum by(redpanda_group) (max by(redpanda_namespace, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) (redpanda_kafka_max_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_namespace="kafka", redpanda_topic=~"[[redpanda_topic]]"}) - on(redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) group_right max by(redpanda_group, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition)(redpanda_kafka_consumer_group_committed_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_group=~"[[redpanda_group]]"})+1)

sum by(redpanda_group) (max by(redpanda_namespace, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) (rate(redpanda_kafka_max_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_namespace="kafka", redpanda_topic=~"[[redpanda_topic]]"}[5m])) - on(redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) group_right max by(redpanda_group, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition)(rate(redpanda_kafka_consumer_group_committed_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_group=~"[[redpanda_group]]"})[5m])+1)

panels.description: Only applies when topics are being written to (to understand the write-rate and compute the offset against that)

targets.expr:
avg
(
    (max by(redpanda_namespace, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition)(redpanda_kafka_max_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_namespace="kafka", redpanda_topic!="__consumer_offsets"}) - on (redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) group_right max by(redpanda_group,redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) (redpanda_kafka_consumer_group_committed_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_group=~"[[redpanda_group]]",redpanda_topic=~"[[redpanda_topic]]"})
    )
    / on (redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) group_right
    max by(redpanda_namespace, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) (rate(redpanda_kafka_max_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_topic=~"[[redpanda_topic]]"}[$__rate_interval])!=0) 
)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStateGetLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateGetLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_valueStateUpdateLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_valueStateUpdateLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_valueStateUpdateLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutAllLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutAllLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutAllLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateAddLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateAddLatency_count{job="$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateAddLatency_count{job="$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (state_name)
